verses.text: How long, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*? Will you forget me forever? How long will you hide \w your|strong="H1732"\w* face from me?

\w How|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* take counsel \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul, having sorrow \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w every|strong="H3068"\w* day? \w How|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemy triumph \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*?

Behold, \w and|strong="H3119"\w* answer \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God. \w Give|strong="H7311"\w* light \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* eyes, lest \w I|strong="H5704"\w* sleep \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w death|strong="H5315"\w*;

\w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemy say, “\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* prevailed \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H6030"\w*;” \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* adversaries rejoice \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* fall.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* trust \w in|strong="H1523"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* loving kindness. \w My|strong="H3588"\w* heart \w rejoices|strong="H1523"\w* \w in|strong="H1523"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* salvation.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H1580"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.
